title: Problem-Solving Strategy Development via Cognitive Load Classification and Brain Activity Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of foundational cognitive science theories, problem-solving methodologies, and fNIRS technology
context.additional_context: A course for professionals in medical, legal, or technical fields to learn efficient management of high-cognitive-load tasks within language domains.

learning_goals: Learners can design an artificial intelligence model that accurately classifies cognitive load into three levels (high/medium/low)
Learners can analyze the correlation between brain activity patterns and cognitive load using fNIRS data
Learners can establish and evaluate optimal cognitive resource allocation strategies when performing problem-solving tasks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
